name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tammy AI: YouTube Summarizer with Chat QnA

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Timestamps for all key points & save to your library!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI-powered Basic & Pro Summarizer Tool plus Chat QnA. Save time with timestamps & add to your library!
Introducing Tammy AI: 🌟 Your Ultimate YouTube Video Summariser App! 🌟

Tired of endless video marathons? Say goodbye to note-taking! With Tammy AI tool, you'll conquer videos effortlessly and save time! ⏰

🚀 What's Tammy AI All About?
• Tammy AI, your AI-powered sidekick, reshapes how you conquer YouTube videos. 
• It's not just smart; it's genius! 🧠 
• Enjoy quick summaries and interactive QnA with timestamps. Wave goodbye to tedious note-taking!

🔥 Feature Highlights:
• Basic & Pro Summarizer with "playable" key point timestamps. 🕒
• Innovative Chat QnA with "playable" timestamps. 💬
• One-click saves to "Library." Time saved, notes banished!
• Powered by Chat GPT/OpenAI & Llama 2 for the best of both worlds!

🔑 Key Features:

Basic Summary Generator with Timestamps:
Get a quick peek into lengthy vids with Basic Summary. It condenses content into chapters & key points. Zoom to specific sections with "playable" timestamps. ⏩🔍

Pro Summary Generator with Timestamps:
Tammy AI's star player app! Pro Summariser crafts a balanced overview with layers: overview, chapters & key points. Chapters kick off with emojis for flair! Find your fave bits with precise timestamps. ⭐ Up to 5-hour video summaries - unmatched!

Chat QnA with Timestamps:
Meet your AI wizard! Chat QnA crafts sharp queries, linking to timestamps. Dive into the juiciest bits sans full video watch. Your AI pal is here! 🎩🤖

Save to "Library" (No More Note Woes!):
With Tammy AI Chrome Extension add on, wave ta-ta to old-school notes. Save to your Library for zen-level organization. Folders for a tidy treasure trove. Info at your fingertips - magic! 📚🔮

⏳ Time's Precious: Seize It with Tammy AI Chrome Ext.!
